storyForm.title: Generate Your Story
storyForm.topicPlaceholder: Ex: A dragon learning to fly
storyForm.alertError: An error occurred while generating the story
storyForm.loginRequired: Please log in to generate stories

step1.title: Step 1: Choose a Topic
step1.description: Enter a topic or idea for your story. It can be anything: adventures, fantasy, science fiction, whatever you want!

step2.title: Step 2: Customize
step2.description: Select the genre, length, and creativity level to make the story fit your needs.

step3.title: Step 3: Generate and Enjoy
step3.description: Click 'Generate Story' and let our artificial intelligence work its magic.

step4.title: Step 4: Listen in Audio
step4.description: You can generate up to 2 different audio versions for each story. Enjoy your story in audio format!

terminos.title: Terms and Conditions
terminos.introduccionTexto: Welcome to MiCuentaCuentos. By accessing and using our service, you accept these terms and conditions. These terms govern your use of our personalized story generation platform.
terminos.usoTexto: Our service is intended for generating personalized stories. You must use the service responsibly and respecting copyright. The following is not permitted: 1) Generating illegal, offensive, or inappropriate content. 2) Attempting to access restricted areas of the system. 3) Sharing your account with third parties. 4) Using the service for commercial purposes without authorization.
terminos.suscripcionTexto: We offer free and paid plans. Subscriptions are automatically renewed and can be cancelled at any time. Payments are processed securely through Stripe. We do not store credit card information. Free plan users have limited access to certain features. The premium plan offers unlimited access to all features.
terminos.propiedadTexto: The generated stories are the property of the user who creates them. MiCuentaCuentos reserves the right to use the stories anonymously to improve the service. The platform and its technology are the exclusive property of MiCuentaCuentos. Copying, modifying, or distributing the code or interface without authorization is not permitted.
terminos.limitacionTexto: We are not responsible for the content generated by users or any damage resulting from the use of the service. The service is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee continuous service availability or the accuracy of generated stories.
terminos.contactoTexto: For any questions about these terms, contact us through our contact form. We offer email support Monday through Friday from 9:00 to 18:00. For urgent technical issues, premium users have access to priority support.

politica.title: Privacy Policy
politica.introduccionTexto: At MiCuentaCuentos, we take our users' privacy very seriously. This policy explains how we handle your personal data and how we protect your privacy while using our story generation service.
politica.datosTexto: We collect the following information: 1) Registration data: name, email, and password (encrypted). 2) Usage data: story preferences, generation history, and settings. 3) Payment data: securely processed by Stripe, without storing card information. 4) Cookies: to improve experience and analyze site usage.
politica.usoDatosTexto: We use your data to: 1) Provide and improve the service. 2) Personalize your experience. 3) Process payments securely. 4) Send important updates. 5) Respond to support inquiries. We do not share your data with third parties except for payment processing or when required by law.
politica.seguridadTexto: We implement robust security measures: 1) Encryption of sensitive data. 2) Secure authentication. 3) Protection against unauthorized access. 4) Regular backups. 5) Continuous security monitoring. Payment data is processed exclusively through Stripe, meeting the highest security standards.
politica.cookiesTexto: We use cookies to: 1) Keep your session active. 2) Remember your preferences. 3) Analyze site usage. 4) Improve performance. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time. Some features may not be available if you disable essential cookies.
politica.derechosTexto: You have the right to: 1) Access your personal data. 2) Correct inaccurate information. 3) Request deletion of your data. 4) Export your data in standard format. 5) Withdraw your consent at any time. To exercise these rights, contact us through the contact form.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: At MiCuentaCuentos, we are dedicated to making story creation accessible and fun for everyone. We use the latest artificial intelligence technology to help you bring your ideas to life.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: We want to be the leading platform in personalized story generation, offering a unique and creative experience for our users.

team.title: Our Team
team.text: We are a passionate team of developers, writers, and creatives working together to create the best story generation experience.

values.title: Our Values
values.creatividadText: We foster creative expression and innovation in every story.
values.accesibilidadText: We make story creation accessible to everyone.
values.calidadText: We are committed to offering the best quality in every generated story.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Do you have any questions or suggestions? We are here to help you.

homepage.heroTitle: Audio stories to learn English while falling asleep.
homepage.heroDescription: Generate personalized stories that engage them in seconds. Choose the topic, genre, and length. And their English level!
homepage.uniqueStoriesDescription: Each story is uniquely generated, adapting to your preferences and style.
homepage.multipleGenresDescription: Choose from adventure, fantasy, science fiction, humor, and more.
homepage.audioConversionDescription: Convert your stories to audio with different voices and accents.
